Html:
This error appears when tryiong to create a user account. Any help would be greatly appreciated. Thanks.

Compilation Error
Description: An error occurred during the compilation of a resource required to service this request. Please review the following specific error details and modify your source code appropriately.

Compiler Error Message: BC30455: Argument not specified for parameter 'lastname' of 'Public Overridable Function Insert(newsletter As System.Nullable(Of Boolean), memberid As System.Guid, address As String, phone As String, firstname As String, lastname As String) As Integer'.

Source Error:



Line 10: Dim da As New DataSetTableAdapters.MemberInfoTableAdapter
Line 11: Dim user As MembershipUser = Membership.GetUser(CreateUserWizard1.UserName)
Line 12: da.Insert(CType(user.ProviderUserKey, Guid), Addr.Text, Phone.Text, fname.Text, lname.Text)
Line 13: user.IsApproved = True
Line 14: Membership.UpdateUser(user)


Source File: F:\HostingSpaces\jerrysdean43@msn.com\sahcinfo.org\wwwroot\Register.aspx Line: 12

jerrysdean43 wrote:
This error appears when trying to create a user account. Any help would be greatly appreciated. Thanks.

Compilation Error
Description: An error occurred during the compilation of a resource required to service this request. Please review the following specific error details and modify your source code appropriately.

Sorry about that, my error, I had the link incorrect.

Are you trying to create the new user on runtime or is that problem occures when a user wants to register?

And since the error message says, did you make sure that the "last name" is entered correctly?
